trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wheeling
There were no other sightings in Wheeling on or around June 15th 2013
Summary: Driving saw bright explosion in distance with no noise and just a quick red,yellow,white light
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back home from picking a girl up from a party to drop her off at home, comming back i looked up in the sky past the light post and saw a bright red yellow white explosion like a arterlliry round had gone off in the distance a few miles away, and i know from expirenxe x military that i would have heard the sound. But it was just silent after a few seconds no explosion just the light
